name: Get Category by ID
description: As a user, I want to GET a category by ID so that I can access the contents of the specific category.

more than one category exists in the system

one category is created and returned
the category shall have the title "School" and description "McGill University"
the Todo Manager system runs well
more than one category exists in the system

a category is not created

name: Post Category
description: As a user, I want to create a category with a body containing a specified set of parameters

a minimum of one category exists in the system

a minimum of one category exists in the system

            | 1  | office | office stuff |

name: Get tasks by project id
description: As a user, I want to get all tasks related to a project so that I can see what tasks are assigned to a project

steps.name: the server is running
at least one project exists
at least one category exists

elements.name: Post category by project id succesfully using an existing category id

steps.name: the user makes a POST request to "/projects/<id>/categories" with a body containing the id "<id>" of the task desired
the category shall appear in the category list of the project
the return code shall be 201
the server is running
at least one project exists
at least one category exists

elements.name: Post category by project id succesfully using an existing category title

steps.name: the user makes a GET request to "/projects/<id>/categories" with a body containing the title "<title>" of the task desired
the categories shall appear in the categories list of the project
the return code shall be 201
the server is running
at least one project exists
at least one category exists

elements.name: Post category by project id succesfully using an non-existing category id

steps.name: the user makes a POST request to "/projects/<id>/categories" with a body containing a non-existing id "<id>"
the category shall not appear in the category list of the project
an error message with content "<errorMessage>" shall be returned
the return code shall be 404

elements.description:
| id | title     | errorMessage                               |
            | 0  | category1 | Could not find thing matching value for id |

name: Post Categories by Project Id
description: As a user, I want to link a category to a project so the project can be tracked

steps.name: the server is running

elements.name: Create a project

steps.name: the user makes a query to create a project item with title "foo", completed "true", active "false", description "bar", tasks "[{1}]"
one project item shall be created and returned
the server is running

elements.name: Create a project with only title and other attributes are set to their defauly values

steps.name: the user makes a query to create a project item with title "study"
one project item shall be created and returned
completed should be set to "false", active "false", description "", tasks ""
the server is running

elements.name: Create a project by providing an id

steps.name: the user create a project using a body with id "<id>"
the project should not be created
an error message with content "<errorMessage>" should be returned

elements.description:
| id | errorMessage                                                       |
            | 1  | Invalid Creation: Failed Validation: Not allowed to create with id |

elements.name: Update all fields in a project

            | 1  | New Title | false     | true   |  work       | [{2}] |
